TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SecurityRoleAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SecurityRoleAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SecurityRoleAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 設定應用程式或元件的角色。

span.span: Configures a role for an application or component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用將角色新增至應用程式，並將其與元件關聯。You can use the to add roles to an application, and to associate them with components. 當會套用至整個組件，它會確保角色是否存在於應用程式設定 （COM + 目錄）。When is applied to an assembly as a whole, it ensures that the role exists in the application configuration (COM+ catalog). 您可以新增使用 COM + 總管角色的成員。You can add members of the role using the COM+ Explorer. 當套用至元件，請確保角色在應用程式組態中，存在，而且將目標元件與角色產生關聯。When applied to a component, the ensures that the role exists in the application configuration, and associates the target component with the role. 根據預設，建立的角色會有任何成員。By default, created roles have no members. 如果屬性設定為`true`，Everyone 使用者群組會自動加入至角色。If the property is set to `true`, the Everyone user group is automatically added to the role. 這是最佳的所有存取類型的角色是指定系統最少的控制權。This is best for all-access type roles that are given minimal control over the system. 您可以在元件層級，每個介面和每個方法中指定安全性角色。Security roles can be specified at the component level, per interface and per method. 如同其他方法的屬性，安全性設定不目前之間會共用介面定義和方法實作。As with other method attributes, security configuration is not currently shared between interface definition and method implementation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性與包含的組件中的角色類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this attribute to associate a role with an assembly that contains classes. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Security#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Security/CPP/employeeinformation.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Security#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Security/CS/employeeinformation.cs#3)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Security#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Security/VB/employeeinformation.vb#3)]

summary.span: 取得或設定安全性角色。

span.span: Gets or sets the security role.

value.span: 套用於應用程式、元件、介面或方法的安全性角色。

span.span: The security role applied to an application, component, interface, or method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SetEveryoneAccess { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 設定數值，指定是否將 Everyone 使用者群組當做使用者加入。

span.span: Sets a value indicating whether to add the Everyone user group as a user.

value.span: 若需要新建立的角色將 Everyone 使用者群組當做使用者加入 (不會修改已存在於應用程式的角色)，則為 ，否則為 ，以抑制將 Everyone 使用者群組當做使用者加入。

span.span: to require that a newly created role have the Everyone user group added as a user (roles that already exist on the application are not modified); otherwise, to suppress adding the Everyone user group as a user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`false`來隱藏加入 Everyone 使用者群組做為新的使用者建立的角色。Set this property to `false` to suppress adding the Everyone user group as a user to newly created roles. 將屬性設定為`true`要求新建立的角色擁有任何人的使用者身分加入。Set the property to `true` to require that a newly created role have Everyone added as a user. 不會修改已經存在於應用程式的角色。Roles which already exist on the application are not modified.
